kickstart.post:
if -d /opt/modulefiles; then
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf4 /bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/application \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf4/2r4
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "2r4"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf4/.version.2r4 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf4/.version
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf5 /bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/application \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf5/1.8.3
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "1.8.3"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf5/.version.1.8.3 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf5/.version
fi
